4. Standards
(a) Development of a Colour Television Standard for Australia (ABC)
5. Exchanges of Technical Information
(a) Experimental Tests with Orthogonal Transmissions (ABC)
(b) Influence of deception Environment on MF Sky Wave
Field Strength (ABC)
(c) Experiments in Bilingual Television Broadcasting in Japan (NHK)
(d) Two Language TV Transmission (AIR)
(e) Medium Frequency Sky Wave Service (AIR)
(f) The Use of Cassette Recorder for Recording Outside Broadcast
Programmes (AIR) *
6. New Equipment and Techniques
(a) A Simple Preview/Edit Controller Unit for Videotape (ABC)
Operations
(b) A Telephone Connector Unit for Recording or
Broadcasting (ABC)
(c) A Sequential Audio Switching Unit for Monitoring
Multiple Radio Network Outputs (ABC)
(d) Radio Studios for One-man Operation (ABC)
(e) A Simple Vidicon Camera Optical Standards Converter for (ABC)
Monochrome Television
(f) A Mobile Cne-Camera Videotape Recorder Unit (ABC)
(g) Low-power Television Translator Using Integrated Circuits (NHK)
(h) Gadget for Rapid Testing of Studios (AIR)
* This topic has been suggested by All India Radio for discussion and
for eliciting information on the subject from other broadcasting
organisations.
